products.title: Turin 25mm Grain Natural Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: Their range of decorative slats are the perfect alternative to a plain, single colour venetian blind. This light brown wood effect venetian blind is perfect to create the look of a wooden blind in rooms, such as bathrooms, where wood isn't suitable. Product id: db-dpfven0317 fabric colour: grain nat s25109 material: aluminium headrail: plain sandstone rails | minimal perfect fit framework | easy drill-free installation clip slat width: 25mm slat material: aluminium control type: tilt wand, tensioned cord-free raise.

products.title: Sylvan Linen Natural Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Their slyvan linen collection combines the pleated style with a linen-look fabric. Featured here in their jura colour - a darker brown grey tone that is a contemporary take on a traditional neautral tone. Product id: sdb-pfp0203 fabric colour: natural material: 100% polyester headrail: minimal perfect fit framework - easy drill-free installation clips control type: manual tensioned pull handle energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - added thermal retention due to framework light filtering: yes sylvan linen natural perfect fit pleated blind in brown.

products.title: Splash Natural Hessian Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. Their roller blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your room. Also, as their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee you can rest assured you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time. Product id: sdb-pfr0644 fabric colour: natural hessian material: 100% polyester headrail: drill-free slimline frame with sleek roller casing control type: cordless spring operated energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes splash natural hessian perfect fit roller blind in cream/brown.
